Message:
I’ll kill you.
As the one who
murdered my sister,
I’ll do whatever it takes
to kill you...!

From that day forward,
I got rid of everything
unnecessary for my revenge.

Tree roots, insects, rotten meat.
I put anything into my mouth.

It helped save money for
my travels, and I had no need
to enjoy my food, anyway.

While I did need sleep,
I had no need for pleasant dreams.

Comfort wouldn’t be of
any use to me now.

One day, with the senses
I’d sharpened from depriving myself...
I overheard a rumor about a duke
who dispelled Curses and
saved witches.

It came to me right away.
Since that woman hunts witches,
it only makes sense she’d go
where witches gather!

It came to me right away.
Since that woman hunts witches,
it only makes sense she’d go
where witches gather!

Hehe, haha... Ahaha...
AHAHAHAHAHA!
Ahhh, I haven’t laughed
like this in ages!

Just you wait, Big Sis.
I’ll definitely avenge you.
